extDescription.message: Popular News application shows you the most popular news in the world

suggestedLocationMsg.message: We are thinking that you are from $location$.To receive more relevant content you need to tell us your location. Please, go to Settings and do it :)
suggestedLocationMsg.description: Greetings when user needs to choose his location

itIsMyLocationMsg.description: Shows as a link when we probably know user location

startTypingYourCity.message: Start typing name of your city...
startTypingYourCity.description: You'll see this text in the text-input field at the settings block

noAnyNewsFoundMsg.message: Ops! Looks like there are no any popular news for that area and chosen category. You can ask your friends to start using the program to make statistic better!
noAnyNewsFoundMsg.description: Shows when there are no any news for that area

loadingNewsMsg.message: Loading most popular news for the area
loadingNewsMsg.description: Shows when system is loading news from server

removeNewsFromListMsg.message: Remove this news from the list
removeNewsFromListMsg.description: Shows at a title for a button which removes news from the list

userLocationImportantNotice.message: It is very important that you uses your real location in that tab. Please, please, please, user your real location here. And if you want to check news at additional areas you can always add them by pressing PLUS at the tabs area
userLocationImportantNotice.description: Shows when user open settings for main location

couldNotDetermineLocationMsg.message: Could not determine your location. Please, got to Settings and set it manually.
